<NEW - Wheelie>

At ths point, Wheelie wave=
d up at Leo Prime, "Alone with the guards, they had me stay.  And then the =
guards curled up and began to cry, and send me away!  So here I came, witho=
ut much to do.  Alone and wanting to help along with the rest of you!"

Whe=
elie paused, and continued to contemplate, "Along with a flying shark who w=
rote a Haiku."  (OOC - Figured I oculd at least toss in a shot out to every=
one's favorite Sky-Byte there!  Not that he's actually here or anything..)

<OLD - Truncated Leo Prime>

> 
> "Mech's and Femmes." He said, his voice =
resuming a measure of
> professionalism. "You have all given many different=
 ideas and
> suggestions, but there are also things for us to think about."=

> 
> He took a moment to look at the different ones present an inviting
> =
smile curving upon his lips, "However does anyone know just where the
> Uni=
cronians are yet?" LEO turned to look at the others in the room,
> "Or what=
 are their current goals and strategies?" There was no anger
> or a putting=
 of anyone down as he spoke, just helping them to see
> points. "Does anyon=
e know who even is in charge of their people, or
> even how many of them ar=
e on Earth?"
> 
> He turned to a different group, "What about the Predacons=
. They are

ger their
> future." LEO PRIME gestured at the door of the ARK, "Remember d=
uring
> the battle, Hydras commanded that Optimus Prime and Megatron not be=

the audience to see what their reaction would be

was not commanding this, but looking for a

<NEW - Wheelie>
=

Wheelie glanced over and around at the room, listening to the plan of Leo =
Prime, the mission assignment, and then over to the Unicronians, "Chaos the=
y want, chaos they attain.  Just by us being here, we alter what will happe=
n in our name.  Each step in the past, we change the future to leave us agh=
ast.  By being here what will be shall not, but will we become what time fo=
rgot?"

Whether that made sense or not, Wheelie plowed ahead, "And remain h=
ere we must, for more I fear, what shall happen if we do not remain here?  =
With the Unicronians about, Chaos at it's best, shall we leave now they sha=
ll take charge of the cascading crest."

And then, as to the plan, "Well, i=
f we don't know what they're going to do, then we'll have to work it out fr=
om them, and so shall the rest of you!"

Pointing his fingers about, "What =
they seem to love is the leaping attack.  So we shall leave a prize out tha=
t they want, and be there when they have a crack."

Wheelie tapping at his =
chin, "What Big Leo said, and Big Shot with him, the Essence of their Fathe=
r calls them to skim.  We'll say we have some of their Dad, they'll come ra=
ging about. We'll have nothing of the sort, then we'll blast them about!"
